main.title: Github Profile
main.about: A better look at your github profile which includes data visualization of your top languages, starred repos and sort your top repos according to the number of forks, stars and size

main.title: Coronavirus Map Dashboard
main.about: A look at the current Global Coronavirus (Covid-19) Cases including confirmed cases, recovered cases, total deaths, active cases, critical cases etc with map to indicate individual coountry confirmed cases, recovered cases and total deaths. It also incorporate graphs to indicate the global cases.

main.title: Ip Address Tracker
main.about: Track any ip address in the world and view their current location/location where the Ip was registered, timezone, and isp. It also indicates the current location of the Ip Address on a map.

main.title: WordSearch
main.about: An application to search for the meaning, synonyms of english words with an added advantage of listening to the pronounciation of the word.

main.title: Joke Web Bot
main.about: Are you having a boring day? This is a web bot that searches for jokes on the internet by clicking on 'get a joke button' and reads out the joke for you using the 'speechsynthesis api' and also you can change the accent/speaker to your choice if the original accent sounds not jovial üòÅ

other.title: Weather App
other.about: Displays the current weather condition of the user current location. If curious, you can also search for other location weather info.

other.title: Password Generator
other.about: Generate random password containing only letters, symbols, numbers, either two of the three or all of them. No need for 'Ctrl + C' üòÑ, just click the copy button üòé

other.title: Quiz App
other.about: Test your knowledge with different questions from different fields.

other.title: Color Palete Generator
other.about: Randomly generate beautif color palette for your project. and you could just press 'J' on your keyboard to generate
